name: knockwurst
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of thick smoked sausage originally from Germany: The tavern serves a German sausage sampler featuring knockwursts, bratwursts, and beef frankfurters, and a variety of mustards. We got some knackwurst to cook on the grill .
More examplesFewer examplesThe sausage vendor had a variety of knockwursts hanging from the ceiling of his kiosk. Cut a slit down the length of the knockwurst so it doesn't explode when you cook it.
